content.description:
Image 1: Giuseppe Pelizza da Volpedo, Italian painter, The Fourth Estate, showing industrial workers on strike, 1901

Alinari/ Art Resource, NY

Image 2: Franz M. Jansen, German painter, etching of factory workers reporting for work, 1921

Digital Image Â© 2014 Museum Associates / LACMA. Licensed by Art Resource, NY
content.question: The Volpedo painting (Image 1) best exemplifies which of the following artistic movements?

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
